name: Great Adventures by Fisher-Price: Wild Western Town
storyline: Bandit Bob has stolen all the gold bars and hidden them in Wild Western Town. The player must become a Deputy to the town Sheriff and find nine gold bars hidden in locations of the town. Once all of the gold is found, Bandit Bob can be captured!
summary: Become a sheriff's deputy and hunt down the stolen gold bars hidden by Bandit Bob across a series of wild-west themed scenes and minigames. Boot barrels at bandits, build custom wanted posters, run the general store, or fire assorted objects from canons, and experience life in Fisher Price's Wild Western Town.
